: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel aligns himself for a shot from the air and releases four plasma charges at Maxima.

: : Wolfenstein : :

Wolfenstein leaped in wolf mode, attemting to tackle Tyrael before he could harm Hydras.

Wolfenstein: You havn't shown your worthyness to fight the commander, you'll deal with me.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Tyrael grinned grimly.

Tyrael: Today is your last day, renegades...

Dreadplague took flight, transforming to her menacing wyvern mode. Her
black scaly body was like a bad omen for the defenders. She turned her
head and saw Perceptor... Pathetic fool, she thought. Then, she
focused her mind on him and stirred up all the fears he had deep down,
but mostly the feeling of despair that comes before death.

She closed in and readied her talons...

Tyrael, though, shot once at Maxima then went for Hydras at a stunning
speed. He did not seem like it, but he matched his enemy on all
points. He intended for Hydras to know he was out for him.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/1/03 6:37:58 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Tripedocus want play with us, my dear"hissed Hidras "And I'm willing 
> > to play with them"
> 
> Following Perceptor out to join the others, she heard Hydras. Her
optics 
> scanning about then turned to look at him. A flash of concern.. but
that soon 
> enough faded. He was the most powerful of all the Cons. There was no
need for 
> concern. Though, there will be a little depending on the situation.
She would 
> still wath her back.. & his! 
> 
> "I don't intend on playing by the rules," she grinned with a wicked
smirk at 
> him. Then turning her attention to the oncoming fire taking cover. 
> 
> > 
> > BlackStorm took a weapon and  left the base, looking for a target. 
> > Perceptor did the same
> > 
> > As soon as, BlackStorm left the base, Hydras took a weapon and said 
> > cooly to Maximna "Do you remember your commands about BlackStorm, my 
> > dear?"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> She looked at him briefly. "Yes. I have the clone created & set. All is 
> ready. It is in a safety chamber." The rifle in her hands as she
turned back to the 
> attackers direction of attack.
